channel.title: Repeated Measures on R notes to myself

item.title: let me count the ways
item.description: psycho package ANOVA Recap EMG + psycho psycho steps THOUGHTS about psycho Likelihood Ratio Tests Lets go hiking EMG + LRT THOUGHTS about LRT lmerTest package is LRT anticonservative? EMG + lmerTest THOUGHTS about lmerTest Next: “how to write about LMM” When we want to learn how to do something new in R, we all start by googling it. Having worked out simple ANOVA, next on my list is repeated measures.
